trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class is used to pass flags to the server to control search behavior.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> é usada para passar sinalizadores para o servidor a fim de controlar o comportamento de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration value that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> que especifica o comportamento de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class using the specified search options.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> usando as opções de pesquisa especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" /> method returns search option for this object.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" /> retorna a opção de pesquisa para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: The search option associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: A opção de pesquisa associada a esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" /> contém um dos valores da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> que especifica o comportamento de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeração que especifica o comportamento da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />.
